VBox.Label: "Resetting the event removes all player characters, spawned"
"mobs, and spawned items from the Trammel T2A area."
"Starting the event will allow players to sign up"
"It will also begin spawning all the zombies. Beware"
"That this initial setup causes a short freeze, so be sure"
"to let the players know in advance."
"Stopping the event will freeze and boot all currently playing"
"characters and won't allow players to rejoin the event."
"If you don't do a reset, then you can 'Start Event' again"
"and players will be able to rejoin where they left off."
